wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
Section 1

Receptionist: Hi there the High Light Hair Salon here – how can I help you?
Customer: My name’s Amanda and I’d like to book an appointment please, with Susie – for as soon as possible. Just for [Q9: [Q10: a]] haircut, thanks.
Receptionist: That’s fine, Amanda just bear with me for a few seconds, I’m just going into Susie’s diary on the computer..... Okay, now we do have a free slot this afternoon at (Q1) 3.30 – she’s had a customer cancel this morning you see, would that be convenient?
Customer: Erm, no.... sorry, I wouldn’t be able to get there on time. How about around 5.30? You are open late this evening, aren’t you?
Receptionist: No... not any more, we close at 5.30 this evening – we used to stay open late three evenings a week, but we’ve cut that down now to just (Q2) Thursdays and Fridays, we haven’t opened late on Wednesdays since June. I can do you 5.30... ah no sorry, wait a minute... (Q3) 5.45 on Thursday if you like?
Customer: Yes that sounds great. I’ll book that please. Actually I only need a haircut for now, but I’d also like to talk with Susie about some suggestions for a hairstyle for my wedding... (Q4) I’m getting married in September and I’d like some advice...
Receptionist: Great. I’ll just take your full name and contact details. Susie will be happy to advise you Amanda. If you’ve got any ideas bring (Q5) some pictures in with you and she’ll be able to tell you what she thinks. Later on we can book some more appointments for you so you can try out some of the styles. Does that sound good?
Customer: Perfect!
Receptionist: So you’ve obviously been here before, if you know Susie....? What’s your surname please?
Customer: Actually, no I haven’t. A friend of mine, Jayne Sands, comes to you regularly and she (Q6) [Q6: recommended] Susie to me. She said that Susie’s just brilliant. My surname is [Q7: Birns] – Amanda Birns.
Receptionist: Burns? Is that B-U-R-N-S.
Customer: No, actually it’s (Q7) B –I –R-N-S. It’s spelt with an I not U.... And my contact number is... actually I’ll give you my work number as my mobile isn’t working properly and I’ve just moved to a new apartment and don’t have a landline yet.  So my work number is (Q8) [Q8: 07 342 9001]..
Receptionist: 07 342 9001... Okay. So we’ll look forward to seeing you on Thursday. Do you know how to find us? We’re at Eastgate (Q9/Q10) Shopping Centre.
Customer: Yes I remember seeing your shop a while ago.... you’re next door to the big electrical shop aren’t you?
Receptionist: That’s right, we used to be but the electrical shop isn’t here any more – it’s a big (Q9/Q10) pharmacy now. There’s open parking air parking to the rear of our building. Or you can park in the multi-storey car park in the centre. It’s free for the first three hours at both of the carparks, after that you pay on the meters..
Customer: Great, that’s good to know. Well thank you very much for your help – I’ll see you later in the week.  Bye for now......
